caption:
Stolen from my dude @jacob_sebring ...

TLDR: If you’re waiting for the real estate market to drop, I have some bad news for you 😬😬

This is the total change in available housing inventory from 2019 (the last “normal” year pre-pandemic) compared to today’s housing inventory. 

FOUR states have slightly more available houses. Four. 

Ten states have less available houses...

Thirty six states have WAYYY LESS available houses. 

Alaska has less than half the available number of homes for sale as we did in 2019, Maryland is slightly better at -48% less... The whole Northeast is not any better. 

Sooooooooo... you want to keep waiting for a change or are you willing to take control of your situation and do the ONE thing that can benefit your future almost more than any other wealth building action can??

🏡If you’re looking to buy or sell a home anywhere in the county I can help either directly or but introducing a trusted referral partner, no matter the price point. 🏡

Randy the Realtor
Reliable
